plot: A TV/Web series dramedy about a gay father who has a "Gilmore Girls" like relationship with his straight teenage son.
plot_en: A TV/Web series dramedy about a gay father who has a "Gilmore Girls" like relationship with his straight teenage son.
plot_es: A TV/Web series dramedy about a gay father who has a "Gilmore Girls" like relationship with his straight teenage son.
title: Just Us Guys
